title: Working Together in Palmyra
subtitle: By Arie Van De Graaff
content: Each person in this picture has one thing in common with one other person. (Hint: It could be the same kind of hat, apron, or hairstyle.) Start with the person next to the letter “F.” Write “F” in the first blank below. Then find the person who is wearing the same hat as person “F.” Write the letter for that person in the next blank. Continue on until you have filled in all the blanks to spell out two words that tell about the people in the picture. Find the
